body.name: VASAGLE Small Bathroom Storage Cabinet, Slim Bathroom Storage Organizer, Toilet Paper Holder with Storage, Toilet Paper Storage Cabinet with Slide Out Drawers, for Small Spaces, White UBBC847P31
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 15. Order within 9 hrs 30 mins
features: [4-Tier Storage] A 2-tier bottom drawer fits toilet paper on the top shelf and bath and shower products on the bottom, a middle drawer for small items, and a top compartment to park your cellphone—this bathroom cabinet suits your various storage needs

[Slide-Out Bottom Drawer] The bottom drawer on casters slides in and out smoothly to allow you to see what’s inside at a glance and access what you need easily. And the underneath panel prevents the drawer from coming off the bathroom storage cabinet

[Versatile for Small Spaces] This 15.7"D x 7"W x 27.5"H small storage cabinet can easily fit the narrow space between the toilet and the wall in your bathroom or tight spaces in your kitchen to add extra storage
[Stable and Durable] Quality MDF is sturdy and durable and the anti-tip kit prevents the cabinet from tipping over to ensure safe use—this is a robust slim bathroom storage cabinet you can trust!
[Hassle-Free Assembly] Thanks to the easy-to-read instructions and numbered parts, you will have this skinny bathroom storage cabinet nestled in the small spaces of your home before you know it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits Perfectly, Attractive Look
reviews.reviewText: We remodeled our bathroom and needed something next to the toilet that was this size, but would also complement the marble tiles we used. This looks great and is a very nice addition to the remodel. Item arrived well packed and was easy to assemble. Lots of pieces, but all numbered and good instructions. Less than 30 minutes to assemble. Very satisfied with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It's a totally functional and reasonably nice looking piece of furniture! I like that unlike an open or wire rack it keeps things dry. The silver knobs look great, and it fits the space I had perfectly.Downsides are that the paint at the edges seems to chip easily, and it could fit together more beautifully, though really it's not bad! Assembly is moderately involved, similar to an ikea dresser or nightstand. A bit more than I'd like, but not difficult.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits in small spaces, holds things
reviews.reviewText: got this to add more storage in the bathroom and it worked great. the only issue I have with it is that a large roll of TP is a very snug fit and has to be mashed a little to make then store properly but all in all I'm happy with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Works but too thin to store much
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I ordered this to fit between the sink and the wall. Unfortunately, it is really too small to fit much of anything. For the price I paid, I’m not super impressed with the quality. All of the pieces arrived unharmed, which is great. The drawer and pullout cabinet on the bottom are not incredible. The drawer is very small and does not have any tracks, so it drops as you pull it out. The cabinet piece does not slide super easily and is a bit loud, it does the job, but I really wouldn’t recommend this for much other than storing toilet paper.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this little cabinet. It does exactly what I expected. The storage is very roomy.It was very easy to put together. I love the large pull-out with the rollers. Rolls with ease. Recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for very narrow spaces
reviews.reviewText: I have a very narrow gap between wall & dresser, plus a need for more storage. This bathroom cabinet was the most appropriate item on Amazon. It is very well-packaged. Not gonna lie, it was minor hell to assemble. Yes, the drawings were very good, each cabinet piece is tagged, all hardware is separately bagged & tagged. But there are so many pieces, so many different screws & bolts, so many tiny things that fall, bounce away & are forever lost. My advice to the not-construction savvy: put all hardware in a basket, along w/ tools. Keep everything together, always. Don’t open packets until needed. If you need to reposition a bolt & it’s hard to retrieve from tight apertures, use a magnet. Pulls those pesky bolts out so you can micro-align them. Also, kudos to manufacturer for including extra screws to replace the one that bounced away.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars pretty good took an hour to assemble
reviews.reviewText: It took me an hour to assemble. The worst part is the poles that is the rail for the drawer on the bottom. But for the most part it was pretty easy and self explanatory. It is a decent cabinet for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for narrow spaces
reviews.reviewText: I like the cabinet. It’s not a cabinet that you can over fill. If you plan to stuff it, buy a larger cabinet.
This is a great fit beside the toilet in the powder room, however the lower drawer is hard to access .

reviews.reviewTitle: A little short for a kitchen
reviews.reviewText: I’m making it work because I needed a 7” cabinet, but would be nice if it came a little taller or in two sizes. I love that it slides out. Wish my baking trays would fit in it.
The media could not be loaded. It fits my space perfectly and I use it for my bathroom storage.

reviews.reviewTitle: The smelliest piece of furniture in the history of furniture
reviews.reviewText: Quality: mediocre.Easy of assembly: good.SMELL: THE WORST EVER. If you've ever used bitter spray to try to keep a puppy from chewing things, this is what it smells like. I've wiped down every surface with 2 different kinds of cleaners, and nothing is making this better. It's now off-gassing (or whatever the heck this smell is) in our workshop, as it's no longer allowed in the house.

reviews.reviewTitle: Petite armoire de salle de bains
reviews.reviewText: Beau format, correspond à mes besoins. Cher pour la qualité. Quelques vis d'assemblage ont du être revissees. De plus, le tiroir frontal ne s’ajuste pas bien dans le meuble.
